duties_responsibilities.duty: Setting up party room, facility, and running instructor-led games for children's birthday parties
Supervising and managing employees during events
Cashier duties and cleaning/flipping the space after events
Setting up and managing open/private play as well as soccer programs
Ensuring proper setup, cleaning, and monitoring for open play/private play and soccer programs

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's preferred)
